channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OK

item.title: Report E-2023070199
item.description:
Report E-2023070199

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-28T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-13
  • City: OKLAHOMA CITY
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that the one poly 65 gallon drum of lubrite2 (un1805) had been damaged by a sharp object and had released 5 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023061716
item.description:
Report X-2023061716

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-27T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-27
  • City: OKLAHOMA CITY
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: On Jun 26, package was unloaded from trailer# 390099, then was sorted to the Van-Lines. When the package reached the van, it was leaking. DescribePack: Lid came loose due to handling and lack of packing which caused a spillage. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was quickly placed in a lined-tote; then isolated for further inspection.

item.title: Report E-2023070166
item.description:
Report E-2023070166

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-26T15:11:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-09
  • City: GLENPOOL
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one case of presoak (un1824) damaging the 2 inner 2 gallon poly containers and releasing 1 gallon of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.
